Name: Fire Sprinkler Water Piping - Horizontal Mains and Branches - Old Style Victaulic - Thin Wall Steel - No bracing, SDC C, PIPING FRAGILITY

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing based upon 1000 ft segments of pipe, horizontal main and branches
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: One failure is expected per 1000 feet of pipe.

DamageStates.Description: Spraying & Dripping Leakage at joints -  0.02 leaks per 20 ft section of pipe
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace leaking joints and minor water cleanup.

DamageStates.Description: Joints Break - Major Leakage - 0.02 breaks  per 20 ft section of pipe
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace 20 ft section of pipe, joints and major water cleanup at leaking joints.
